mapper.select: select a.no as no, a.title as title, a.depth as depth, a.hit as hit, b.no as userNo, b.name as name, a.reg_date as regDate from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by a.group_no DESC, a.order_no ASC limit #{page },5

select b.no as no, b.title as title, b.depth as depth, b.hit as hit, b.user_no as userNo, a.name as name, b.reg_date as regDate from board b join user a on a.no = b.user_no where b.title like '%${keyword }%' or b.contents like '%${keyword }%' or a.name like '%${keyword }%' order by b.group_no DESC, b.order_no ASC limit #{page },5
mapper.insert: insert into board values(null, #{title }, #{contents }, now(), 0, (select IF(isnull(max(group_no)+1), 1, max(group_no)+1) from board ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY), 0, 0, #{userNo })
mapper.select: select no, title, contents, user_no as userNo, group_no, order_no, depth from board where no = #{no }
mapper.delete: delete from board where no = #{no } and user_no = #{userNo }
mapper.update: update board set hit = hit + 1 where no=#{no }
update board set title=#{title }, contents=#{contents } where no=#{no } and user_no=#{userNo }
mapper.select: select count(*) from board b join user a on a.no = b.user_no where b.title like '%${keyword }%' or b.contents like '%${keyword }%' or a.name like '%${keyword }%'
mapper.update: update board set order_no=order_no+1 where group_no = #{no } and order_no>=1
update board set order_no=order_no+1 where group_no = #{no } and order_no>#{orderNo }
